com.github.marceloleite2604.blimp

Class Blimp

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.marceloleite2604.blimp.Blimp

  • public class Blimp
extends Object
    The Blimp is a Basic Library for Internationalized Messages Pursuit. It helps retrieving internationalized messages from properties files.
    Author:
    MarceloLeite2604
    See Also:
    GitHub project

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Blimp()
      Constructs a Blimp object, retrieving message files from DEFAULT_MESSAGE_FILE_PATH for DEFAULT_LOCALE.
      Blimp(List<String> messagesFilePaths)
      Constructs a Blimp object, retrieving message properties from file paths informed on messagesFilePaths using DEFAULT_LOCALE locale.
      Blimp(Locale locale, List<String> messagesFilePaths)
      Constructs a Blimp object, retrieving message properties from file paths informed on messagesFilePaths using locale informed on locale parameter.
      Blimp(Locale locale, org.springframework.context.MessageSource messageSource)
      Constructs a Blimp object, retrieving messages from MessageSource informed on messageSource parameter using locale informed on locale parameter.
      Blimp(Locale locale, String... messagesFilePaths)
      Constructs a Blimp object, retrieving message properties from file paths informed on messagesFilePaths using locale informed on locale parameter.
      Blimp(org.springframework.context.MessageSource messageSource)
      Constructs a Blimp object, retrieving messages from MessageSource informed on messageSource parameter using DEFAULT_LOCALE locale.

      • Blimp

        public Blimp(List<String> messagesFilePaths)
        Constructs a Blimp object, retrieving message properties from file paths informed on messagesFilePaths using DEFAULT_LOCALE locale.
        Parameters:
        messagesFilePaths - A list of file paths to search for message properties.

      • Blimp

        public Blimp(Locale locale,
             List<String> messagesFilePaths)
        Constructs a Blimp object, retrieving message properties from file paths informed on messagesFilePaths using locale informed on locale parameter.
        Parameters:
        locale - Locale which will be used to retrieve message properties.
        messagesFilePaths - A list of file paths to search for message properties.

      • Blimp

        public Blimp(Locale locale,
             String... messagesFilePaths)
        Constructs a Blimp object, retrieving message properties from file paths informed on messagesFilePaths using locale informed on locale parameter.
        Parameters:
        locale - Locale which will be used to retrieve message properties.
        messagesFilePaths - File paths to search for message properties.

      • Blimp

        public Blimp(org.springframework.context.MessageSource messageSource)
        Constructs a Blimp object, retrieving messages from MessageSource informed on messageSource parameter using DEFAULT_LOCALE locale.
        Parameters:
        messageSource - The message source used for messages retrieval.

      • Blimp

        public Blimp(Locale locale,
             org.springframework.context.MessageSource messageSource)
        Constructs a Blimp object, retrieving messages from MessageSource informed on messageSource parameter using locale informed on locale parameter.
        Parameters:
        locale - Locale which will be used to retrieve message properties.
        messageSource - The message source used for messages retrieval.

      • getMessage

        public String getMessage(Message message,
                         Object... parameters)
        Retrieves a message from one of the message files.
        Parameters:
        message - Message object which contains the message code.
        parameters - Parameters to inform on message elaboration.
        Returns:
        The message retrieved filled with the parameters informed.

                         Object... parameters)

        parameters - Parameters to inform on message elaboration.

      • getSingularOrPluralMessage

        public String getSingularOrPluralMessage(boolean singular,
                                         Message message)
        Retrieves either the singular or plural equivalent of a message.
        Parameters:
        singular - When true the singular message will be retrieved. Otherwise, its plural equivalent will be used.
        message - Message object which contains the message code.
        Returns:
        The message retrieved filled with the parameters informed.

      • getSingularOrPluralMessage

        public String getSingularOrPluralMessage(boolean singular,
                                         String messageCode)
        Retrieves either the singular or plural equivalent of a message.
        Parameters:
        singular - When true the singular message will be retrieved. Otherwise, its plural equivalent will be used.
        messageCode - The message code to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The message retrieved filled with the parameters informed.

      • getSingularOrPluralMessage

        public String getSingularOrPluralMessage(boolean singular,
                                         Message message,
                                         List<Object> singularParameters,
                                         List<Object> pluralParameters)
        Retrieves either the singular or plural equivalent of a message.
        Parameters:
        singular - When true the singular message will be retrieved. Otherwise, its plural equivalent will be used.
        message - Message object which contains the message code.
        singularParameters - Parameters to be used when a singular message will be elaborated.
        pluralParameters - Parameters to be used when a plural message will be elaborated.
        Returns:
        The message retrieved filled with the parameters informed.

      • getSingularOrPluralMessage

        public String getSingularOrPluralMessage(boolean singular,
                                         String messageCode,
                                         List<Object> singularParameters,
                                         List<Object> pluralParameters)
        Retrieves either the singular or plural equivalent of a message.
        Parameters:
        singular - When true the singular message will be retrieved. Otherwise, its plural equivalent will be used.
        messageCode - The message code to be retrieved.
        singularParameters - Parameters to be used when a singular message will be elaborated.
        pluralParameters - Parameters to be used when a plural message will be elaborated.
        Returns:
        The message retrieved filled with the parameters informed.
